mapper.select: SELECT CASE ptp.team_id WHEN pgs.team_id THEN ( SELECT t_name FROM playball_team WHERE team_id = pgs.opponent_id ) ELSE ( SELECT t_name FROM playball_team WHERE team_id = pgs.team_id ) END AS teamName, CASE ptp.tp_position IS NULL WHEN TRUE THEN '队长' ELSE ( SELECT text FROM playball_sports_position WHERE id = ptp.tp_position ) END AS position, pus.id AS id, pus.schedule_id AS scheduleId, pus.player_id AS playerId, pus.sports_id AS sportsId, pus.user_id AS userId, pus.data_json AS dataJson, pus.create_time AS createTime, pus.update_time AS updateTime, pus.is_delete AS isDelete FROM playball_schedule_userdata pus LEFT JOIN playball_game_schedule pgs ON pgs.id = pus.schedule_id LEFT JOIN playball_team_players ptp ON ptp.tp_id = pus.player_id WHERE ptp.tp_id = #{tpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
